entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
